channel.title: This is how you make the fucking earth - Final version - New pictures
channel.description:
Alright, this is my result after 1 hour working on our lovely globe in 3DS Max, this has an appart layer for landscape and seas, an appart layer for clouds, an appart layer for our atmosphere and an appart layer for the environment. Tell me what you think. I could like make the difference between landscape and seas but I think it would be useless because it already looks pretty badass.
[b]Credits: 90% to me 4% to NASA for the earth texture 4% to NASA for the clouds texture 2% to NASA for the environmet texture And I'm serious, those textures are from NASA's database.[/b]
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll242/VregScapeOwner/theearth.jpg[/img]
[b]PROOVE THAT THIS IS MINE:[/b]
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll242/VregScapeOwner/theearthproove.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll242/VregScapeOwner/Untitdfgdfgdgled.png[/img]
[b]EDIT: NEW VIEWS FOR FRELL:[/b]
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll242/VregScapeOwner/earthfront.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll242/VregScapeOwner/earth3Ds.jpg[/img]
[b]EDIT: HERE IS A 1920 x 1200 VIEW AND THE LANDSCAPE AND SEA TEXTURE OF THE MODEL:[/b]
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll242/VregScapeOwner/hdearth.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll242/VregScapeOwner/worldtopobathy2004083x5400x27000.jpg[/img]
[b][size=18pt]FULL HD BEAUTIFUL ANIMATION COMING SOON, MY LAPTOP IS 2 WEAK TO RENDER IT, MY FRIENDS BEAST COMPUTER IS GOING TO RENDER IT FOR ME IN FULL HD[/size][/b]

item.title: This is how you make the fucking earth - Final version - New pictures
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“MrPotatoHead, post:20, topic:334772”]ooooo pretty pictures
You guys got the ability to set the specular of the oceans different to the specular of the land?[/quote]i definitly can don’t know bout frell but he probably also can

EDIT: alright then, ill post it there 2
